speaker: Melvin
Text: Melvin: Yo DeAndre, Don’t be late to class today because Mrs. Harrison is making us take a test and you know she crazy enough to fail you for being late. And if she does, Coach is going to kill you and take you out of the starters.

speaker: DeAndre
Text: DeAndre: Damn, I forgot I needed to be early today. I might have to run..

speaker: DavidWhite
Text: Officer David White: “Why are you running?!”

speaker: DeAndre
Text: DeAndre: “I *breathe* woke up *breathe* later today sir”

speaker: DavidWhite
Text: Officer David White: Where are you going?

speaker: DavidWhite
Text: Officer David White: “Well you know what time school starts. It never changes so there is no reason for you to be late.

speaker: DeAndre
Text: DeAndre: “Yes sir…”

speaker: DavidWhite
Text: Officer David White: Well get going then!

speaker: DeAndre
Text: *huff* *huff*

speaker: DavidWhite
Text: Officer David White: Boy! Are you deaf? I asked you a question.

speaker: DeAndre
Text: DeAndre: No, I was….

speaker: DavidWhite
Text: Officer David White: I don’t care what your excuse is. You do as I say! Do I make myself clear?

speaker: DeAndre
Text: DeAndre:Yeah alright! I was running to school because I was about to be late!

speaker: DavidWhite
Text: Officer David White: Are you getting aggressive?

speaker: DeAndre
Text: DeAndre:  .... No. I did as I was told....

speaker: schoolCop
Text: Officer: You go here?

speaker: DeAndre
Text: DeAndre: ...Yeah

speaker: schoolCop
Text: Officer: Why are you late?

speaker: schoolCop
Text: Officer: Why are you late?

speaker: DeAndre
Text: DeAndre: I..I..um...overslept a little..

speaker: schoolCop
Text: Officer: Hmph..Well you better try harder to get here on time next time.

speaker: DeAndre
Text: Yes sir.

speaker: DeAndre
Text: Don't worry about it.

speaker: schoolCop
Text: Officer: What was that, boy? Who do you think you're talking to? You better watch that mouth of yours.

speaker: schoolCop
Text: You better hurry up, boy. Classes are about to start.
